article_title: If Anthem Splits With Express Scripts, A New PBM May Emerge

article_metadata.description: News that Anthem is suing its pharmacy benefit management vendor Express Scripts could be the precursor to building its own large PBM as other rival health insurers have done or are planning to do. Anthem sued Express Scripts in federal court in New York in an attempt “to recover damages for pharmacy [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
